name: Gobi Desert
hint: Large desert spanning southern Mongolia and northern China

name: Thar Desert
hint: Arid region on the India-Pakistan border, also called the Great Indian Desert

name: Siberian Taiga
hint: World's largest terrestrial biome, a vast boreal forest across Russia

name: Tibetan Plateau
hint: Highest and largest plateau in the world, known as the 'Roof of the World'

name: Deccan Plateau
hint: Large plateau covering most of southern India

name: Sundarbans
hint: Largest mangrove forest in the world, spanning India and Bangladesh

name: Western Ghats
hint: Mountain range along India's western coast, a UNESCO biodiversity hotspot

name: Borneo Rainforest
hint: One of the oldest rainforests on Earth, shared by Malaysia, Indonesia, and Brunei

name: Fertile Crescent
hint: Crescent-shaped region in the Middle East, cradle of early civilization

name: Maldives Atolls
hint: Chain of 26 coral atolls in the Indian Ocean, lowest country on Earth
